entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
